Package Model

Class ThatsLife

java.lang.Object
Model.ThatsLife
public class ThatsLife
extends java.lang.Object
ThatsLife is the master (main) class for the model aspect of the That's Life! game.

Composes all of the involved classes in the same package (Model) and contains the implemented methods to manipulate the subclasses and other primitive attributes involved to replicate the game system of That's Life!.

  • Method Details

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public boolean setNumOfPlayers​(int noOfPlayers)
      Sets the number of players that will play the game. Returns a boolean value depending on the validity of the number of players value passed.
      Parameters:
      noOfPlayers - the number of players
      Returns:
      true if the number of players is valid; false otherwise.

    • createPlayer

      public boolean createPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new player given the name inputted. Returns a boolean value depending on the validity of the name passed.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new player to be added
      Returns:
      true if the name is unique and not null; false if name already exists from previously added players or was null

    • isPlayerNameExist

      private boolean isPlayerNameExist​(java.lang.String name)
      Checks whether the given name inputted already exists in previous players or not.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new player to be added
      Returns:
      true if name does not exist or is unique; false otherwise.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Changes the value of the index (playerTurn) to indicate the next player now having the turn.

    • isActionRequireCard

      public boolean isActionRequireCard()
      Checks if the action to be done in the current space landed on by the current player in-turn requires drawing of specific card.
      Returns:
      true if action requires card draw; false otherwise.

    • isActionRequireSpin

      public boolean isActionRequireSpin()
      Checks if the action to be done in the current space landed on by the current player in-turn requires spinning of the game wheel.
      Returns:
      true if action requires wheel spin; false otherwise.

    • isActionRequirePlayer

      public boolean isActionRequirePlayer()
      Checks if the action to be done in the current space landed on by the current player in-turn involves other players in the game.
      Returns:
      true if action requires involvement of other players; false otherwise.

      Clears the previously drawn cards for the next player.

    • executeAction

      public boolean executeAction()
      Analyzes and executes the action to be done based on the type of the current space landed on by the player in-turn.
      Returns:
      true if player in-turn did not do any extra action from the specific event, player borrowing money from the bank for example; false otherwise.

    • greenAction

      private boolean greenAction()
      Analyzes and executes the action of the green space landed.

      The returned boolean value is always true if the action done was pay day. For pay raise, will return false if player had reached the number of times a pay raise can be done as stated in the career card.

      Returns:
      true if pay day or if max pay raise was not yet reached; false otherwise.

    • magentaAction

      private boolean magentaAction()
      Analyzes the executes the action of the magenta space landed.

      The returned boolean value will depend on the specific magenta space action done by the player in-turn. For Graduation Space, will always return true since it is an one-time action.

      Will return false if,

      For Get Married space, player is already married. For Buy House space, player does not have enough money to pay the house therefore borrowing money from the bank (loan). For Have Children space, player has already reached the max number of children allowed.

      Returns:
      true if the conditions above the specific actions were not met; false otherwise.

    • blueAction

      private boolean blueAction()
      Analyzes and executes the action of the blue card drawn.

      The returned boolean value will depend if the player matched the career stated in the blue card drawn or if the player will pay another player (if another player has the stated career) or the bank. Will always return true matched the career stated in the blue card drawn.

      Returns:
      true if the player matched the career or did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false if player borrowed money from the bank to pay.

    • orangeAction

      private boolean orangeAction()
      Analyzes the executes the action of the action card drawn.
      Returns:
      true if the player did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false otherwise.

    • isMatchingCareer

      public boolean isMatchingCareer()
      Checks if the player in-turn matched the career stated in the blue card drawn
      Returns:
      true if player in-turn matched the career; false otherwise.

    • findPlayerWithCareer

      public void findPlayerWithCareer()
      Specifically for blue card action, gets the index of the player that matches the career stated in the blue card if the player in-turn did not match the career. Assigns the index acquired to the playerChoice attribute, -1 if no player found.

    • payToPlayer

      private boolean payToPlayer​(int amt)
      Pays the player chosen by the action of the player in-turn. If the player to be paid is already retired, will not be affected by the action instead.
      Parameters:
      amt - the amount to be paid to the chosen player
      Returns:
      true if the player in-turn did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false otherwise.

    • cashFromPlayer

      private boolean cashFromPlayer​(int amt)
      Gets cash from player chosen by the action of the player in-turn. If the player to get cash from is already retired, will not be affected by the action instead.
      Parameters:
      amt - the amount to be paid from the chosen player
      Returns:
      true if the chosen player did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false otherwise.

    • payToAll

      private boolean payToAll​(int amt)
      Pays all other players as specified by the action of the player in-turn. If the player to be paid is already retired, will not be affected by the action instead.
      Parameters:
      amt - the amount to be paid to the players
      Returns:
      true if the player in-turn did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false otherwise.

    • cashFromAll

      private boolean cashFromAll​(int amt)
      Gets cash from all players as specified by the action of the player in-turn. If the player to get cash from is already retired, will not be affected by the action instead.
      Parameters:
      amt - the amount to be acquired from the players
      Returns:
      true if the chosen player did not borrow money from the bank to pay; false otherwise.

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()
      Gets the number of players in this game.
      Returns:
      the number of players

    • getNumOfActivePlayers

      public int getNumOfActivePlayers()
      Gets the number of players that are not yet retired in this game.
      Returns:
      the number of players that are not yet retired.

    • retirePlayer

      public void retirePlayer()
      Retires the current player having the turn.

      From retirement the current player will,

      Get cash according to retirement place, get cash according to how many children the player has, get cash according to the price of the house acquired, and pay all outstanding loan balances with interest.

      Checks as well if all players have retired to update and mark the game as already finished.

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished()
      Gets the boolean value indicating if the game is already finished (all players have retired) or not.
      Returns:
      true if game is already finished; false otherwise.

    • getWinner

      public java.lang.String getWinner()
      Gets the String indicating the winner of the game according to highest amount of cash acquired.

      If the case occurs wherein atleast two players have the same highest amount of cash, a String indicating that the game ended in a draw is returned instead.

      Returns:
      the String indicating either the winner of the game or a draw
